configurator.description: Chronos lets you personalize your experience with a sleek dark and light theme, as well as flexible sidebar layouts.
configurator.headline: Beautifully minimal

ctaSection.description: Already tracking your Jira worklogs? Make it faster and easier with Chronos for macOS. Start today!
ctaSection.headline: Get started with Chronos

adminPermissions.answer: Chronos connects directly to your Jira account, so admin permissions are not required. However, Jira worklogs must be enabled, and certain admin settings might restrict app usage. If you encounter issues, let us know, and we’ll assist you. Refunds can also be requested via Apple’s “report a problem” platform.
adminPermissions.question: Does Chronos require admin permissions in Jira?

builtWith.answer: Chronos is built using React Native macOS, offering a native experience with a lightweight footprint.
builtWith.question: What technologies is Chronos built with?

freeAlternative.answer: While free alternatives like Timkee exist, Chronos is designed to provide a superior experience with features like support for multiple accounts and a sleek, intuitive interface. As a side project by two developers, our revenue helps cover essential costs like Apple developer licenses and hosting. If you're technically inclined, you can also clone our GitHub repository and build it yourself.
freeAlternative.question: Why choose Chronos over free time-tracking apps?

freeTrial.answer: We do not offer a free trial. You can build the project yourself by cloning our GitHub repository and running it locally, but that requires technical knowledge.
freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial available?

offlineUsage.answer: Chronos requires an internet connection to sync with Jira. However, you can track time offline and then sync them once you’re back online.
offlineUsage.question: Can I use Chronos offline?

otherThenJira.answer: Chronos is specifically designed for Jira and does not support other services. We are thinking about adding other services in the future, but for now we are focusing on Jira.
otherThenJira.question: Can I use Chronos with other services than Jira?

supportedPlatforms.answer: Chronos is available exclusively on macOS. While we have a Windows build, there are no immediate plans for other platforms. If you’re interested in a specific platform, please let us know.
supportedPlatforms.question: Which platforms are supported?

whatIsChronos.answer: Chronos is a time tracking app for Jira, designed to make managing your daily worklogs simple and intuitive.
whatIsChronos.question: What is Chronos?

dataHandling.answer: Chronos securely handles your data by using encrypted connections to communicate with Jira. We do not store your credentials or worklogs on our servers.
dataHandling.question: How does Chronos handle my data?

jiraCredentials.answer: Chronos uses OAuth to connect to your Jira account. Your credentials are never stored on our servers, ensuring maximum security.
jiraCredentials.question: Does Chronos store my Jira credentials?

foundBug.answer: Contact us via email at {SUPPORT_EMAIL} or through our GitHub repository.
foundBug.question: I found a bug. Where can I report it and get help?

iWantToHelp.answer: We appreciate your interest in contributing! You can report bugs, suggest features, or contribute code via our GitHub repository.
iWantToHelp.question: I want to help develop this further. How can I contribute?

loginError.answer: If you encounter the error "This app requires access to a Jira & User identity site which you don’t have or don’t have the permission to access.", it usually means your account doesn’t have access to Jira or external app access is restricted. Please ensure you are using the correct email address and verify that you can log in to the Jira web interface with your account. If you can access Jira but still face this issue, contact your Jira administrator as they may have restrictions in place.
loginError.question: Why do I get a Jira & User identity access error when logging in?

missingFeatures.answer: We’re always open to feedback and feature requests. Please let us know what you’re missing, and we’ll consider it for future updates.
missingFeatures.question: I am missing a specific feature. Can you add it?

notWorkingRefund.answer: If Chronos doesn’t work for you, contact us, and we’ll investigate. Refunds can also be requested via Apple’s “report a problem” platform.
notWorkingRefund.question: The app is not working for me. Can I get a refund?

supportLanguage.answer: We offer support in English and German and will respond in the same language you use.
supportLanguage.question: In which languages do you offer support?

featureCarousel.description: Chronos is packed with thoughtful features to make time tracking effortless and enjoyable. From smart search to desktop widgets, we've got you covered.

desktopWidget.infoPopup: Add a widget to your desktop for a quick overview of your worklogs.
desktopWidget.label: Desktop Widget

fullscreenMode.infoPopup: Our app is designed to be compact, but if you need more space you can go fullscreen and enjoy a productive layout.
fullscreenMode.label: Fullscreen mode

germanTranslation.infoPopup: Enjoy full German translation support for a seamless experience.
germanTranslation.label: German Translation

menubarWidget.infoPopup: Start and stop your timers directly from the menubar for quick access to start and stop timers.
menubarWidget.label: Menubar Widget

reminderNotification.infoPopup: Busy day at work? We can send you a reminder notification so you don't forget to track your time.
reminderNotification.label: Reminder Notification

rightClickContextMenu.infoPopup: You can skip our beautiful UI and use the right click context menu to clean up your worklogs.
rightClickContextMenu.label: Right click context menu

shortcuts.infoPopup: We got a few shortcuts to make your life easier.
shortcuts.label: Shortcuts

smartSearch.infoPopup: Our smart search is optimized to easily find recent and current issues that you are working on.
smartSearch.label: Smart search

workspaceLogos.infoPopup: Lots of Jira workspaces don't setup their workspace logo that is available in the Jira API. We got you covered by providing the header logo as well.
workspaceLogos.label: Workspace logos

featureCarousel.headline: ...and some more nice-to-haves

appOverview.description: Get a complete view of your worklogs with our clean and intuitive interface, designed to make time tracking effortless.
appOverview.headline: Your work at a glance

manualSubmit.description: Review and adjust your worklogs before submitting them. Submit only when you're ready.
manualSubmit.headline: Manual submission

multipleAccounts.description: Easily manage worklogs across multiple accounts. Perfect for agencies or freelancers working with different clients.
multipleAccounts.headline: Connect multiple accounts

startStop.description: Start and stop timers for your tasks directly in the app. Track your time as you work, without the hassle.
startStop.headline: Real-time tracking

fourOhFour.description: The page you are looking for could not be found.
fourOhFour.headline: Page not found

heroShineTop.description: Use the Chronos app to manage your daily Jira worklogs in an easy and intuitive way. Stop the time waste of time tracking.

newsletter.description: Get notified on new Nice A.F. releases!

errorMessage.badRequest: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errorMessage.duplicate_parameter: You are already subscribed to the newsletter.
errorMessage.invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address.
errorMessage.invalid_parameter: You are already subscribed to the newsletter.

errorMessage.unauthorized: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

newsletter.headline: Nice A.F Newsletter Signup
newsletter.successMessage: Signup successful! You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

screenshots.overviewLightAlt: A screenshot of the Chronos app and light mode

screenshots.sidebarCompactLightAlt: A screenshot of the Chronos app sidebar in compact layout and light mode
